thread.title: An aquarist
thread.title_full: Complete Aquatics reviewed by An aquarist

author: An aquarist
title: An aquarist
text: Everything about dealing with this company was excellent, from the outlay of the website to its choice of courier (DPD). Because I was setting up a new tank, I ended up ordering in three separate lots. When I emailed them to ask to amalgamate the orders it was no problem. They even sorted out the amended delivery charges unprompted. Oh, and their prices seemed very competitive as well. Really, really, really good company to do business with.
